content: Howdy Bitcointalk Community,Get ready for another thrilling round of our BTC/USD Price Prediction Contest ROUND 3! üåüRound 3 Details:-Predict the BTC/USD price before December 23nd, 2023, @ 22:00 UTC.To participate, you must be a JacksClub player. Don't have an account? Sign up here!One prediction per participant - choose wisely!No editing allowed after placing your prediction!Christmas Special Incentives:üåàExpanded Prize Pool: Celebrate the season with a boosted prize pool of $200!üåà Early Bird Boost: The first 15 participants get a 20% bonus on your prize if your prediction wins!Rules and Terms:Winners (1st, 2nd, and 3rd) will be determined based on the Bitcoin price at Coinmarketcap on December 26th, 2023, @ 10:00 UTC.Prizes: 1st Place: $65 | 2nd Place: $45 | 3rd Place: $30 | 4th, 5th, and 6th Places: $20 eachJacksClub management reserves the right to keep the game thrilling, so stay tuned for surprises!Post Format:JacksClub Username:Prediction: $xx,xxx.xxLet the prediction frenzy begin at JacksClub.io on Bitcointalk, and may the winning vibes roll! üåàüéâBest Regards,JacksClub Team üÉèüé∞(Note: Don't miss out on the Early Bird Boost - be among the first 20 participants!)
